idea-plugin.name: LogSensei
idea-plugin.description: LogSensei helps Java developers learn good logging practices by suggesting where and what type of logs to add. Features: - Suggests adding error logs in empty catch blocks - Warns about null checks without logging - Recommends debug logs for public method entries - Adds info logs for service methods - Educational tooltips explaining log levels
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • Basic logging suggestions for catch blocks
  • Null check warnings
  • Public method entry logging
  • Service method logging
  • Educational tooltips
